titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Royal College of Emergency Medicine - Description

body.p: The Royal College of Emergency Medicine is an ORGANISATION .

The Royal College of Emergency Medicine ( RCEM ) works to ensure high quality care for PATIENTS by setting and monitoring standards of care in Emergency Care Departments , as well as providing expert guidance and advice on policy to relevant bodies on matters relating to Emergency Medicine.
For further information on the Royal College of Emergency Medicine , see the Royal College of Emergency Medicine website at: The Royal College of Emergency Medicine .
